0.instructions:
Unfiltered Anise Syrup

Add 100g of hot water to a beaker. Add 150g of sugar to the beaker. Add 10g star anise. Stir for 3 minutes (ideally while heating).
0.gpt3_output:
<XDL>
  <Synthesis>  
      <Hardware>
          <Vessel id="beaker" />
      </Hardware>
  
      <Reagents>
          <Reagent name="hot water" />
          <Reagent name="sugar" />
          <Reagent name="star anise" />
      </Reagents>
  
      <Procedure>
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="hot water" amount="100g" />
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="sugar" amount="150g" />
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="star anise" amount="10g" />
          <StartStir vessel="beaker" />
          <Stir vessel="beaker" time="3min" />
          <StopStir vessel="beaker" />
          <FilterThrough vessel="beaker" filter="coffee filter" />
      </Procedure>
  </Synthesis>
</XDL>

1.instructions:
Unfiltered Anise Syrup

Add 100g of hot water to a beaker. Add 150g of sugar to the beaker. Add 10g star anise. Stir for 3 minutes (ideally while heating). 
<XDL>
  <Synthesis>  
      <Hardware>
          <Vessel id="beaker" />
      </Hardware>
  
      <Reagents>
          <Reagent name="hot water" />
          <Reagent name="sugar" />
          <Reagent name="star anise" />
      </Reagents>
  
      <Procedure>
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="hot water" amount="100g" />
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="sugar" amount="150g" />
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="star anise" amount="10g" />
          <StartStir vessel="beaker" />
          <Stir vessel="beaker" time="3min" />
          <StopStir vessel="beaker" />
          <FilterThrough vessel="beaker" filter="coffee filter" />
      </Procedure>
  </Synthesis>
</XDL>
This XDL was not correct. These were the errors
You must have 'to_vessel' property when doing 'FilterThrough'
You must have 'through' property when doing 'FilterThrough'
The Hardware section should only contain Component tags
The vessel property in the FilterThrough procedure is not allowed. The allowed properties are: eluting_volume, to_vessel, from_vessel, eluting_solvent, through, eluting_repeats, residence_time.
You must have 'from_vessel' property when doing 'FilterThrough'
The filter property in the FilterThrough procedure is not allowed. The allowed properties are: eluting_volume, to_vessel, from_vessel, eluting_solvent, through, eluting_repeats, residence_time.
beaker is not defined in Hardware
Please fix the errors.
1.gpt3_output:
<XDL>
  <Synthesis>  
      <Hardware>
          <Component id="beaker" />
      </Hardware>
  
      <Reagents>
          <Reagent name="hot water" />
          <Reagent name="sugar" />
          <Reagent name="star anise" />
      </Reagents>
  
      <Procedure>
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="hot water" amount="100g" />
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="sugar" amount="150g" />
          <Add vessel="beaker" reagent="star anise" amount="10g" />
          <StartStir vessel="beaker" />
          <Stir vessel="beaker" time="3min" />
          <StopStir vessel="beaker" />
          <FilterThrough from_vessel="beaker" to_vessel="beaker" through="coffee filter" />
      </Procedure>
  </Synthesis>
</XDL>
